    Legacy Questions

    This section refers to legacy library-related questions that do not apply to the latest or recent version of the Discord.Net library.

    X, Y, Z does not work! It doesn't return a valid value anymore.

    If you are currently using an older version of the stable branch, please upgrade to the latest pre-release version to ensure maximum compatibility. Several features may be broken in older versions and will likely not be fixed in the version branch due to their breaking nature.

    Visit the repo's release tag to see the latest public pre-release.

    I came from an earlier version of Discord.Net 1.0, and DependencyMap doesn't seem to exist anymore in the later revision? What happened to it?

    The DependencyMap has been replaced with Microsoft's DependencyInjection Abstractions. An example usage can be seen here.

    This page was last modified at 9/8/2019 4:17:55 PM +00:00 (UTC).
